page.title: 11ANIMALS
page.content: The Vale of the White Horse Kennels houses 62 couple of hounds and ten horses for the fox hunt. There is a rectangle of 8 bungalows to house kennel men, huntsmen, girl grooms and their families. Most of the cattle on the farms are Freisans but one farm keeps a herd of Ayrshires. On another farm there is a flock of Jacob's Sheep. The favourite domestic animal is the dog; 156 household had one or more dogs. Cats are pets at 56 homes and 45 houses have various types of fish. 4 homes have ponies and there are 65 houses with other pets - tortoises, birds etc. Most pet owners spend about Â£3 a week on pet food.
